lead_paragraph: Following is a list of 63s, the lowest scores recorded in major championships, after American Robert Streb became the 28th player to achieve the feat in the second round of the PGA Championship at Baltusrol Golf Club in Springfield, New Jersey on Friday (United States unless stated):

headline.print_headline: Factbox: Players Who Have Shot 63s at Majors
